segments.text: I think about how the children are collaborating in this little adventure of cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s posture is so eager, almost like she’s supporting her partner in crime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake off the fear that one wrong move could lead to a painful fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy’s concentration, his tongue stuck out slightly as he focuses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment of childhood I want to capture and yet, I dread the crash that might follow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How long before the woman turns around and realizes what's happening right under her nose?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a tightly-wound spring, ready to snap at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
